title: Autonomous Driving System Operator Training Design: Customized Training for Advanced Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: For professionals in healthcare, law, or technical fields with advanced domain expertise, emphasizing hands-on practice through digital tool simulations and real-case analyses.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core technologies of autonomous driving systems (ADAS/ADS) through mathematical modeling.
Learners can design project-based safety operation procedures for autonomous driving systems in a simulated environment.
Learners can present customized educational strategies for diverse driver types (age/experience) using a mathematical framework.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
